forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low near 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 39F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 42F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 49F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 40F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 47F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low around 35F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 49F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
